name: Without Update Themes
author: 8suzuran8

sections.description:
This plugin is does not update the theme.

If you plan to distribute theme without published in the official directory,
and when the different theme of the same name exists in the official directory,
the use to prevent unexpected updates.

For example, if you want to sell for a fee.
For example, if you creates and do not want to distribute.
For example…
For example…
For example…
sections.installation:
Installation using “Add New Plugin”
1. From your Admin UI (Dashboard), go to Plugins. Click the “Add New” button.
2. Search for plugin, or click the “Upload” button, and then select the plugin you want to install.
3. Click the “Install Now” button.

Manual installation
1. Upload the “without-update-themes” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.

Settings
1. visit plugins => Without Update Themes Settings
2. check to without update theme
3. click save button
